title: Create FO-12 KV store seeds and register
description:
## Objective

Create KV store seed data for FO-12 based on the Trinev2 reference prompts, adapted for FO-12's changes.

## Spec Reference

**Spec:** docs/projects/2026-02-16-fo-12/2026-02-16-fo-12-spec.md — Section: "KV Store Keys"
**Trinev2 Reference:** docs/projects/2026-02-16-fo-12/2026-02-16-fo-12-trinev2-reference.md

## Scope

**Files to create:**
- src/db/seeds/fo-12.ts — All KV seed entries for FO-12

**Files to modify:**
- src/db/seeds/index.ts — Add fo12Seeds import and spread into allSeeds

## Implementation

1. Create src/db/seeds/fo-12.ts following the exact pattern from fo-11.ts
2. Use Trinev2 prompts from the reference file as the basis for all prompt content
3. Key adaptations from Trinev2 to FO-12:
   - Step numbering: Trinev2's prompt_step_5 becomes FO-12's prompt_step_4, prompt_step_6 becomes prompt_step_5
   - Remove all references to step 7 (Additional Context) — FO-12 has no step 7
   - Batch size: Change all references from "5 affirmations" to "10 affirmations" in affirmation prompts
   - Exchange count: Change "2-4 exchanges" to "2-3 exchanges" in system prompts
   - Namespace: All keys use versions.fo-12.* prefix
4. KV keys to create (all with .default suffix):
   - versions.fo-12._info.default
   - versions.fo-12._model_name.default (gpt-4o)
   - versions.fo-12._temperature.default (0.8)
   - versions.fo-12.system.default (discovery system prompt)
   - versions.fo-12.prompt_step_4.default (context — from Trinev2 step_5)
   - versions.fo-12.prompt_step_5.default (tone — from Trinev2 step_6)
   - versions.fo-12._model_name_affirmation.default (gpt-4o)
   - versions.fo-12._temperature_affirmation.default (0.9)
   - versions.fo-12.system_affirmation.default (affirmation system — from Trinev2)
   - versions.fo-12.prompt_affirmation.default (from Trinev2, adapted: 10 affirmations)
   - versions.fo-12.prompt_affirmation_with_feedback.default (from Trinev2, adapted: 10 affirmations)
5. Modify src/db/seeds/index.ts: add import { fo12Seeds } from './fo-12' and spread into allSeeds array

## Tests

1. TypeCheck — npx tsc --noEmit passes
2. Seed runs — npm run db:seed completes without errors

Run: npm run db:seed

Do NOT close until tests pass.
acceptance_criteria: npm run db:seed completes without errors
closed_reason: Created FO-12 KV store seeds based on Trinev2 reference. Files: src/db/seeds/fo-12.ts (11 keys: _info, _model_name, _temperature, system, prompt_step_4, prompt_step_5, _model_name_affirmation, _temperature_affirmation, system_affirmation, prompt_affirmation, prompt_affirmation_with_feedback), src/db/seeds/index.ts (registered fo12Seeds). Key adaptations: step 5/6 -> 4/5, no step 7, batch size 5->10, exchange count 2-4->2-3, prompt_affirmation_with_feedback uses batch_size variable for dynamic phase 3 sizing. npm run db:seed completed without errors.
